verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> was seen <S%G3700><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>: a woman <S%G1135><s%> arrayed with <S%G4016><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the moon <S%G4582><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> her <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> her <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> a crown <S%G4735><s%> of twelve <S%G1427><s%> stars <S%G792><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> she was with <S%G1722><s%> child <S%G1064><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> she crieth out <S%G5605><s%>, travailing in birth <S%G5605><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in pain <S%G928><s%> to be delivered <S%G5088><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there was seen <S%G3700><s%> another <S%G243><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, a great <S%G3173><s%> red <S%G4450><s%> dragon <S%G1404><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> diadems <S%G1238><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> tail <S%G3769><s%> draweth <S%G4951><s%> the third part <S%G5154><s%> of the stars <S%G792><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> did cast <S%G906><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%> standeth <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> that is about <S%G3195><s%> to be delivered <S%G5088><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> she is delivered <S%G5088><s%> he may devour <S%G2719><s%> her <S%G846><s%> child <S%G5043><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> she was delivered <S%G5088><s%> of a son <S%G730><s%>, a man child <S%G5207><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is to <S%G3195><s%> rule <S%G4165><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a rod <S%G4464><s%> of iron <S%G4603><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> child <S%G5043><s%> was caught up <S%G726><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> throne <S%G2362><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> fled <S%G5343><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>, where <S%G3699><s%> she hath <S%G2192><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> of <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> they may nourish <S%G5142><s%> her <S%G846><s%> a thousand <S%G5507><s%> two hundred <S%G1250><s%> and threescore <S%G1835><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>: Michael <S%G3413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> going forth to war <S%G4170><s%> with <S%G2596><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%> warred <S%G4170><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> they prevailed <S%G2480><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, neither <S%G3777><s%> was <S%G2147><s%> their <S%G846><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> any more <S%G2089><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> dragon <S%G1404><s%> was cast down <S%G906><s%>, the old <S%G744><s%> serpent <S%G3789><s%>, he that is called <S%G2564><s%> the Devil <S%G1228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%>, the deceiver <S%G4105><s%> of the whole <S%G3650><s%> world <S%G3625><s%>; he was cast down <S%G906><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> were cast down <S%G906><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Now <S%G737><s%> is come <S%G1096><s%> the salvation <S%G4991><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the authority <S%G1849><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> the accuser <S%G2725><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> is cast down <S%G2598><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> accuseth <S%G2723><s%> them <S%G846><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> night <S%G3571><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> overcame <S%G3528><s%> him <S%G846><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the blood <S%G129><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they loved <S%G25><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> their <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> even unto <S%G891><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>.

Therefore1223, 5124 rejoice <S%G2165><s%>, O heavens <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G3588><s%> that dwell <S%G4637><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>. Woe <S%G3759><s%> for the <S%G2730><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> for the sea <S%G2281><s%>: because <S%G3754><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> is gone down <S%G2597><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> wrath <S%G2372><s%>, knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he hath <S%G2192><s%> but a short <S%G3641><s%> time <S%G2540><s%>.
And when the dragon saw that he was cast down to the earth, he persecuted the woman that brought forth the man child.

And <S%G2532><s%> there were given <S%G1325><s%> to the woman <S%G1135><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> wings <S%G4420><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> eagle <S%G105><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> she might fly <S%G4072><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> her <S%G846><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>, where <S%G3699><s%> she is nourished <S%G5142><s%> for <S%G1563><s%> a time <S%G2540><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> times <S%G2540><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> half <S%G2255><s%> a time <S%G2540><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of the serpent <S%G3789><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the serpent <S%G3789><s%> cast out <S%G906><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a river <S%G4215><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he might cause <S%G4160><s%> her <S%G3778><s%> to be carried away by the stream <S%G4216><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> helped <S%G997><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> her <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> swallowed <S%G2666><s%> up the river <S%G4215><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%> cast out <S%G906><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%> waxed wroth <S%G3710><s%> with <S%G1909><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G565><s%> away to make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> of her <S%G846><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%>, that <S%G3588><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hold <S%G2192><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>:
